title: News24.com | WATCH | 'Drink some vodka instead' - Some countries are not isolating
description: Countries like Sweden and Belarus have not heeded global calls to enforce a lockdown to slow the spread of Covid-19.
content:
Countries like Sweden and Belarus have not heeded global calls to enforce a lockdown to slow the spread of Covid-19.
Sweden is the only country in the EU that hasn't enforced a lockdown of any kind, and instead is relying on citizens to "self-regulate". The … [+443 chars]
